title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 574.3 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 574.3 - Applicability

State Regulations
(a) These
regulations apply to hospitals licensed pursuant to article 31 of the Mental

Hygiene Law and issued operating certificates in accordance with Part 582 of
this Title. (b) These regulations
apply to payments made by government agencies pursuant to title 11 of article 5
of the Social Services Law for services provided by a hospital licensed by the

Office of Mental Health in accordance with the provisions of Part 582 of this

Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
574.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
